text: haha yeah smart move. life's too short to waste on people who don't get it
actually ramen with rice is really my go-to, especially when I'm tired üòÇ
haha ramen and rice together, that's a solid combo honestly. do you go for instant ramen or the real stuff from a shop?
haha yeah, it's really a solid combo üòÇ sometimes i go for instant ramen, but more often i get the real stuff from a shop.
what time did you usually go for lunch

usually around 12 or 12:30, depends on work stuff

why, you hungry? haha
ohh okayy i see haha, no  i usually eat lunch at 1pm because our break time is 1pm haha
ah makes sense, that's pretty late lunch though haha. you must get pretty hungry by then
yes, that's why before I leave the house I make sure I'm full so I'm not too hungry before break time haha

haha smart, basically carb loading before work

do you cook or just like eat a big breakfast?
I cook, I always eat for breakfast and dinner, but for lunch I eat at the mall because I only have a 30 minute break at work haha
ahh makes sense, 30 minutes isn't much time to do anything haha. what do you usually get at the mall?
hmm.. you mean for lunch? sometimes at mcdonalds but often jollibee
ah jollibee, i've heard about that place actually haha. never been though since we don't have it here
oh yes, but this is just a Filipino version of mcdo so they don't have anything different, maybe just the taste of gravy and ketchup üòÇ
haha the gravy and ketchup make that much of a difference?
yes for me, jollibee's gravy and ketchup are tastier than mcdo's haha
haha fair enough, guess the condiments really do matter then
yea yea, i'm on my way home now i'm only at work for half a day today haha
oh nice, heading home early then haha. going straight to the beach after or just relaxing at home?
I went to my grandma's house to cook dinner for her and I just finished cleaning the house üòÇ
oh that's really sweet of you, taking care of your grandma like that. you're a good granddaughter haha
yes I do this to her every day since I don't want my grandma to get tired, she should just relax all the time haha
that's really sweet, she's lucky to have you haha. must be tiring some days though?
I cooked adobo for her, it's a Filipino dish of pork with soy sauce and vinegar haha
Honestly, it's tiring but I love my grandmother, so for me, my tiredness disappears when I see her happy haha
that's really sweet, honestly. adobo sounds good too, i've heard of it but never tried it haha
oh yes. actually, adobo is popular here in the philippines, but i don't like to eat it often. I rarely eat this, only on special occasions üòÜ
haha wait so you cook it for her but you don't even like eating it yourself? that's dedication
Actually, after I cooked at grandma's house earlier, I went home to cook food for my parents, so I didn't eat at grandma's house earlier, hehe

adobo sounds really good, you gotta teach me how to make it sometime haha

btw random thought but i saw your story the other day.. the beach one? you looked really sexy honestly, had to do a double take üòè
